record.field: You cannot erase party "%(party)s" while they have deposit at company "%(company)s".
The account "%(account)s" has not enough deposit from party "%(party)s".
No account for deposit settlement configured in the accounting configuration.

The available deposit for party "%(party)s" is less than the deposit used.\n\nTo re-calculate the used deposit set the invoice first back to draft. When proceeding the party will have an overdue deposit.
